description: This is a JavaScript source file implementing a quiz application with question data, state management, rendering functions, event handling, and utility functions for a web-based quiz interface.

methods.name: loadScoreboard
methods.description: Loads the scoreboard data from localStorage, sorts by score descending and date ascending.

methods.name: saveEntry
methods.description: Saves a new attendee score entry into localStorage.

methods.name: clearStorage
methods.description: Removes the quiz scoreboard data from localStorage.

methods.name: hideAll
methods.description: Hides all main screens of the quiz interface.

methods.name: renderHome
methods.description: Displays the home screen of the quiz app.

methods.name: renderInstructions
methods.description: Displays the instructions screen.

methods.name: renderQuestion
methods.description: Displays the current question with options, progress, and timer.

methods.name: renderResult
methods.description: Displays the quiz result summary and triggers confetti if high score.

methods.name: renderScoreboard
methods.description: Displays the scoreboard with ranked scores.

methods.name: selectOption
methods.description: Handles selection of an answer option.

methods.name: nextQuestion
methods.description: Advances to the next question, auto-advancing if time runs out.

methods.name: submitName
methods.description: Saves attendee name and score, then shows scoreboard.

methods.name: clearScoreboard
methods.description: Clears all stored scores and updates the scoreboard display.

methods.name: retryQuiz
methods.description: Resets quiz state and returns to home screen.

methods.name: startTimer
methods.description: Starts countdown timer for answering questions.

methods.name: stopTimer
methods.description: Stops the countdown timer.

methods.name: updateProgressBar
methods.description: Updates the visual progress bar based on current question index.

methods.name: launchConfetti
methods.description: Displays confetti animation for high scores.

methods.name: resetState
methods.description: Resets quiz state variables to initial values.

methods.name: startQuizFlow
methods.description: Begins the quiz by resetting state and rendering the first question.

methods.name: wireEvents
methods.description: Attaches event listeners to UI elements for user interaction.
